alert.note: Alert for Madison; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 2:01AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Madison and southwestern Warren Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 201 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Avenue Of The Saints Event Center, or 10 miles east of Winterset, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Indianola, Avenue Of The Saints Event Center, St. Charles, New Virginia, Martensdale, Patterson, St. Marys, Bevington, Lake Ahquabi State Park and Otter Creek County Park. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 47 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
